column4: I need some help with the karmic UNR. I am using it with aspire one AO715h. Poulsbo drivers from PPA. Aperently After a update, the menu of the netbook remix isn`t visible anymore...
is anyone using karmic netbook remix?
what ya need
I can`t see the menu....
what does it show
it doesn`t show anything... I cant see the buttons on the right side
Legendario:what are you running it on and ver. k or g
Legendario:what are you running it on
i am runing gnome. karmic netbook remix
on an Acer Aspire One AO715h
Legendario:what device
on an Acer Aspire One AO715h
Legendario:ok gimme a sec
ok. i am using this config: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/HardwareSupportComponentsVideoCardsPoulsbo/
Legendario:I am running the k desktop on acers and have no major issue
Legendario:well one an acer and on a dell
what model of acer?
Legendario:wish I could say its with my son at college
but i am using gnome...
Legendario:just chose netbook from this page http://www.kubuntu.org/getkubuntu/download
Legendario:I run gnome on desk not netbook
it`s been hard to get help for UNR with this hardware...
